text: |Specialist Centres|Columbia Road Redchurch Street Hackney Wick|Columbia Road – support the specialist shopping and leisure role of Columbia Road by retaining the very small-scale commercial units and promoting their continued occupation by independent, artisanal businesses. Redchurch Street – support the specialist shopping role of Redchurch Street as a centre for independent clothing retailers and a centre for food and drink and the nighttime economy. Hackney Wick – working with the London Borough of Hackney, support the strong mix of employment and town centre uses, with a particular emphasis on culture and the arts, as well as evening and night-time leisure uses including micro-breweries.|Columbia Road – centre of local significance Redchurch Street – centre of local significance Hackney Wick – centre of local significance|
